dc_title_s: A new map of the Kingdom of Poland with its dismembered provinces
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially.; Shows vegetation, marshes, etc.; Appears in T. Kitchin's General atlas, describing the whole universe.|46 x 64 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:2,450,000|General Map Collection
